title: Vaajra Neelam & Emerald Chandbali Earrings
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish. The gold has been meticulously crafted to achieve a rich
features: These exquisite Chandbali earrings showcase a harmonious blend of traditional design and modern elegance. The central circular design is intricately set with Polki diamonds, complemented by vibrant emeralds in a teardrop shape. The design also features a striking pear-shaped blue sapphire at the top, surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds. Lustrous South Sea pearls dangle gracefully, adding a touch of sophistication. A smaller sapphire drop in the center adds another layer of intricacy.
occasions: and special occasions. Perfect for bridal wear or as a statement piece for festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi. Suitable for both traditional Telugu events and contemporary gatherings.
description: These Chandbali earrings are a testament to exceptional craftsmanship, boasting genuine gemstones and high-quality materials. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring lasting beauty. The combination of blue sapphire, emeralds, polki diamonds, and South Sea pearls creates a unique and luxurious aesthetic. The earrings are designed for comfort and durability, making them a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The traditional design is subtly updated for a modern appeal.
